name: pulse_editor_code_view
description: A code editor based on CodeMirror 6 for Pulse Editor.

scripts.dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--import=tsx' NODE_ENV=development concurrently --prefix none "webpack --mode development --watch" "tsx watch --clear-screen=false express.ts"
scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--import=tsx' webpack --mode production
scripts.build-client: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--import=tsx' BUILD_TARGET=client webpack --mode production
scripts.build-server: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--import=tsx' BUILD_TARGET=server webpack --mode production
scripts.preview: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--import=tsx' PREVIEW=true concurrently --prefix none "webpack --mode development --watch" "tsx watch --clear-screen=false express.ts"
